alert.note: Alert for Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Erath County through 215 PM CDT... At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morgan Mill, or 12 miles north of Stephenville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephenville and Morgan Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
